amendment.description: To set aside an amount for grants to media organizations to support broadcasting that promotes human rights and democracy in Iran.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2014 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2014 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Brownback. (consideration: CR S13367; text: CR S13367) To set aside an amount for grants to media organizations to support broadcasting that promotes human rights and democracy in Iran.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2014 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2014 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Brownback.
